...指定幸存者（Designated survivor）是美国总统在发表国情咨文演讲期间故意安排的一名缺席内阁成员，此举是为了防止总统在发表国情咨文演讲期间国会山遭遇突发性灾难事件，导致总统、副总统、国会领袖及内阁成员全体丧生，导致政权陷入瘫痪，因此必须有一名部长级官员缺席以在发生不测时，接掌国家领导职务。美国华裔能源部长朱棣文是.

encyclopedia.content: 幸存者(Survivor)是一个在遍布世界许多国家进行的电视真人秀节目。美国的哥伦比亚广播公司 （CBS) 的节目中，十几个来自美国的参与者被送到世界各地荒凉的岛屿，野外，依靠及其基本的工具维持生存，必须自己寻找食物，并参与各种测量智商，体力的竞技竞赛，最终胜出者将赢得100万美元的奖金。《幸存者》参照了一个瑞典成功的电视节目《鲁宾逊探险》。但因为《幸存者》的成功直接产生了一系列类似电视节目，所以一般认为，《幸存者》是此类电视节目的开山之作。

entry.tran: 幸存者;生还者;幸免于难者
entry.def: A survivor of a disaster, accident, or illness is someone who continues to live afterwards in spite of coming close to death.

example.ex: Officials said there were no survivors of the plane crash.
example.tran: 官方说这次飞机失事无一人生还。

entry.tran: 遭遇过(不幸经历)的人;经受过(苦难)的人
entry.def: A survivor of a very unpleasant experience is a person who has had such an experience, and who is still affected by it.

example.ex: This book is written with survivors of child sexual abuse in mind.
example.tran: 这本书关注的是童年时遭受过性骚扰的人。

entry.def: A person's survivors are the members of their family who continue to live after they have died.

example.ex: The compensation bill offers the miners or their survivors as much as $100,000 apiece.
example.tran: 这笔补偿金能向矿工或遇难矿工的家属每人赔偿100,000美元。

entry.tran: 能在艰苦环境中生存的人;挺过困难者
entry.def: If you describe someone as a survivor, you approve of the fact that they are able to carry on with their life even though they experience many difficulties.

example.ex: Above all Susie is a great survivor, with a bright, indomitable spirit.
example.tran: 总之，苏茜不畏艰难，开朗乐观、不屈不挠。

entry.tran: 活到现在的人;留存至今的事物
entry.def: If you describe a person or thing as a survivor from an earlier period, you mean that they are still present or available, but other people or things from that period have died or disappeared.

example.ex: Rafferty was the sole survivor from the successful Ireland team of 1988.
example.tran: 拉弗蒂是 1988 年红极一时的爱尔兰队硕果仅存的球员。

example.ex: ...a black 1950 Cyclops, which is the only known survivor of 30 test cars built by Rover.
example.tran: 路虎制造的 30 辆试验车中目前仅存且为人所知的就是一辆 1950 年的黑色 Cyclops 遥控机械排爆车。

Sentence.sentence: Many firms will die, but the survivors will emerge leaner and stronger than before.
It's thought there are no survivors.

It must have been terrible for the survivors.
sentences.cn: 对于幸存者来说那一定十分可怕。

sentences.en: Each of the survivors had a terrible tale to tell.
sentences.cn: 每一个幸存者都有一番恐怖的经历可讲。

sentences.en: A massive sea search has failed to find any survivors.
sentences.cn: 经过大规模的海上搜救仍未找到幸存者。

sentences.en: There was only one survivor of the plane crash.
sentences.cn: 这次飞机失事中只有一名幸存者。
